dict.key: the clearest way into the universe is through a forest wilderness
look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better
the good man is the friend of all living things
the earth is what we all have in common
everyone smiles in the same language
keep the child in you alive and playing
life is the dancer and you are the dance
there is no rule that says i have to live life like everyone else
the world is changed by your example, not by your opinion
our own life has to be our message
where there is life, there is hope
we did not inherit the earth from our ancestors, we are just borrowing it from our children
